movies.title: Cirque du Soleil: Corteo
movies.plot: A grand procession and festive parade imagined by a clown with awesome acrobatics. A theatrical world of comedy and spontaneity situated in a mysterious space between heaven and earth. Corteo reveals the strength and fragility of a clown, as well as his wisdom and kindness, to illustrate the portion of humanity that is within each of us.
movies.simplePlot: A grand procession and festive parade imagined by a clown with awesome acrobatics. A theatrical world of comedy and spontaneity situated in a mysterious space between heaven and earth. ...

biography.bio: Mauro Mozzani is an actor, known for Cirque du Soleil: Corteo (2006) and A escena (2009).
biography.name: Mauro Mozzani

actors.character: The Dead Clown / The Marionette / Helium Dance

biography.bio: Igor Issakov is an actor, known for Cirque du Soleil: Corteo (2006) and Alegria: Cirque du Soeil (2001).
biography.name: Igor Issakov

biography.bio: Sean Lomax was born as Sean Allan Lomax. He is an actor, known for Un Noël sans fin (2013), Cirque du Soleil: Corteo (2006) and Sonny Days (2012).
biography.name: Sean Lomax

biography.bio: Valentyna Pahlevanyan is an actress, known for Cirque du Soleil: Corteo (2006).

biography.bio: Mitchell Head is an actor, known for Cirque du Soleil: Corteo (2006) and Michael Jackson: The Immortal World Tour (2012).
